aboutPage.description: Rubic est un écosystème DeFi multichaîne qui propose des échanges cross-chaînes, en P2P, des échanges instantanés et des ordres limites sur plusieurs blockchains, dans le but de fournir une plate-forme décentralisée UNIQUE complète.

0.title: Routage personnalisé
0.description: Rubic a créé un système de routage unique qui permet à ses utilisateurs d'échanger n'importe quel token. L'avantage principal est de pouvoir calculer le prix du gaz au plus juste et de pouvoir proposer à ses utilisateurs la meilleure route possible tout en payant un minimum de gaz.

1.title: Échanges instantanés
1.description: Exécutez un échange instantané grâce aux nombreux DEX externes supportés (mais avec les meilleurs taux !)

2.title: Support Multi-chaînes
2.description: Blockchains supportées actuellement : Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain & Polygon

3.title: Échanges Cross-chains
3.description: Compléter des échanges entre ces réseaux : BSC <-> Ethereum & Polygon <-> Ethereum

4.title: Faucet
4.description: Notre Faucet va permettre à nos utilisateurs d'acheter des jetons en utilisant RBC or ETH sans KYC (Connaissance du Client). Actuellement, nos utilisateurs peuvent acheter du BNB, mais plus à venir !

5.title: Échanges P2P
5.description: Créez votre échange selon vos propres termes.

6.title: Ordre Limite
6.description: Définissez le taux souhaité et votre transaction sera exécutée automatiquement lorsque l'un des DEX répondra aux paramètres de votre transaction

data.3: Support Multi-chaînes : Réseaux Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain & Polygon
data.5: Le pourcentage des revenus de la plateforme peut-être réglementé

data: Intégrations de nouvelles blockchains et DEX
Solutions Cross-Chain pour ETH et BSC
Création du jeton BRBC et bridge personnalisé pour RBC-BRBC
Prise en charge des jetons personnalisés
Prise en charge des jetons personnalisés
CoinGecko et CoinMarketCap API pour ETH<>RBC
Support de nouveaux portefeuilles - Wallet Connect + Wallet Link (Coinbase)
Suivi de toutes les paires de jetons sur CoinGecko & CMC
Intégrations de nouvelles blockchains/Bridge (Candidats : Anyswap/XDai, HECO, Moonbeam, Fantom, Avalanche, RenBTC)
Début du développement du Cross-Chain Rubic 2.0, améliorant la stabilité et la décentralisation
Livraison du système de remboursement automatique
Création d'un support 24/7 pour notre communauté
Intégration du Rubic Relay Widget pour nos partenaires
Divers correctifs et améliorations pour notre solution Cross-Chain
Intégration de 0x et réduction des frais de gaz

Trois nouvelles blockchains intégrées (Compatible avec le Cross-Chain Rubic) parmis : Avalanche (AVAX), Cardano (ADA), Cosmos (ATOM), Polkadot (DOT), Kusama (KSM), Fantom (FTM), Elrond (EGLD), Enjin (ENJ), Pulse chain (ticker PLS), Optimism, Arbitrum
Intégration de Yield Farming et/ou Lending Product
Intégration de 3-6 blockchains (Compatible avec le Cross-Chain Rubic)

questions.title: What is Rubic?
questions.answer: Rubic is a Cross-Chain Tech Aggregator for users & dApps. Rubic aggregates 60+ chains, 90+ DEXs & bridges, and enables swapping of 15,500+ assets in 1 click.

questions.title: What is the Rubic Cross-Chain Tools?
questions.answer:
Rubic’s Cross-Chain Tools enable your platform to act as a gateway to buy your project’s token. An easy-to-install Widget and a battle-tested SDK let your users swap from any of 15,500+ tokens across 60+ blockchains to your custom token!

Explore more: https://tools.rubic.exchange/

questions.title: What is BTCB?
questions.answer: BTCB (Bitcoin BEP2) is a token on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) that represents Bitcoin (BTC) in a 1:1 ratio. It is a wrapped version of BTC that allows users to access BTC's value and features on the Binance Smart Chain network. BTCB provides liquidity and interoperability between the BSC and BTC, enabling users to trade or use BTC in decentralized applications on BSC.

questions.title: Can I send BTCB to a BTC wallet address?
questions.answer: No, BTCB (Bitcoin BEP2) is a token on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC), and it cannot be sent directly to a BTC (Bitcoin) wallet address. BTCB operates on a different blockchain and requires a compatible BSC wallet for sending and receiving transactions.

questions.title: Who can use our service?
questions.answer:
Rubic is a cross-chain solution aggregator for users and dApps.

Rubic’s B2B Features: Rubic’s Cross-Chain tools will help developers easily make their Web3 dApps cross-chain, aggregating the best cross-chain tech.

Rubic’s B2C Features: Exchange 15,500+tokens across 60+ blockchains (both EVM and non-EVM, targeting 100+ chains by the end of 2023) with the best transaction speeds - in one click, with fiat on-ramps and limit orders for advanced trading.

questions.title: How does Rubic unite different DEX platforms?
questions.answer: Users will be able to choose the suitable DEX protocol in order to get the best tokens rates with the lowest gas prices. Rubic always analyzes and compares all the variants, and comes up with the best rate. Please notice that while checking all the alternatives we consider the GAS fee. Rubic strives to provide users with the best exchange opportunities.

questions.title: Why do we need to make a choice between different providers?
questions.answer:
The gas fees and price rates of these protocols are different, therefore the opportunity of having more options empowers the users to make better trading decisions.

Moreover, Rubic created a routing solution that will allow users to trade any token on different networks. Our self-created routing system for Ethereum has several advantages over the Uniswap routing system. The main advantage is the ability to calculate gas prices and show users the best-optimized solution while paying the least amount of gas.

Our routing system gives users lower prices on their swaps than most DEXs. Users will receive quotes for lower prices in situations where the price difference between different swap outcomes costs more than the ANTICIPATED price difference for the miner’s commission fees. When this difference in swap price is more than the difference in miner’s commission fees, the user will be presented with an option for a cheaper swap route. In situations where this occurs, users will also be given an option with a more expensive gas fee and a longer route to execute the swap, due to potential issues with liquidity.

questions.title: How To Contact Support?
questions.answer: If you need assistance, feel free to contact our support team here by submitting a ticket on our website or on our Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot Live chat - Contact Rubic team for immediate assistance using chat. Available 24/7. Email Support - support@rubic.finance. Message Rubic Support anytime with more complex or technical questions. We're here to help.

questions.title: What is the Rubic Relay widget and how can we integrate it?
questions.answer: The Rubic Relay is a great solution for the problems projects face regarding low user turnover. It keeps users on your website, transforming trades into a simple action: the Relay offers users and project owners the function of buying and selling tokens on their own project’s webpage, leading users to stay on your website for longer out of sheer utility. The Relay is also scalable across different devices, and it’s possible to change the colours and size of the Relay widget itself as well. Here is a detailed instructional guide for the Relay’s integration: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ULxjzN3sVc2indb5-_PtR7v7jui_tCJ7/view?usp=sharing

questions.title: What should I do when I see the message “Trading is not available“?
questions.answer:
If you get this message, try the following methods:
1. Reload the page.
2. Clear the website cache.

 If it didn’t help probably one of the tokens you try to swap doesn’t have enough liquidity for this trade.

questions.title: Why does my On-Chain swap have a long-lasting “Pending” status?
questions.answer: Reason: It’s possible that the gas fee that was set is not enough to process your transaction. How to solve: If the transaction is “Pending”, it is best to accelerate the transaction manually, by changing to the desired value of gas, in order to force the completion of the transaction. It can be done via your wallet. You will be able to pay an additional gas fee. If you still need assistance, feel free to contact our support team hereby submitting a ticket or on Telegram https://t.me/RubicSupportBot

questions.title: Why do I get the “Insufficient Balance” error?
questions.answer:
If you swap a native token and you encounter this error it means that you are trying to send all of your transferable funds out, without leaving enough balance for the transaction fees. If you transfer a non-native token, a value exceeding the available balance has been entered in the “Amount” field. 
Also, please check that you have connected the proper wallet and you have enough tokens for the swap.
The fee is shown on the transfer screen before you confirm the transfer. Deduct this amount from the total amount you're sending out, and your transfer will go through.

questions.title: What should I do if I get the “Price Impact Too High” error?
questions.answer:
Reason:
 This error is caused by low liquidity.

Try trading a smaller amount, or increase slippage tolerance via the settings icon and try again. If that did not help, then the token’s liquidity is too low to swap.

questions.title: What if my transaction has a “Dropped & Replaced” status on the scanner?
questions.answer:
Dropped & Replaced" means the transaction has been replaced by a new one.

 There are two possible reasons for that status:
1. You have accelerated the transaction in your wallet and will receive the desired tokens, you can find out information about the transaction in the “Replaced by Txn Hash" tab.
2. You probably cancelled the transaction by mistake. The assets will not be debited from your address, but the gas fee will not be refunded back to you.

questions.title: Why did I get the ”Expired” status on the scanner?
questions.answer:
The transaction was not mined in the time period allotted for it.

In this scenario, the transaction should be sent again. Note that during the transaction, the gas spent on its execution is burned, but not completely. A gas fee is also charged for conducting the re-sent transaction.

questions.title: Why do I get “Warning! Error Encountered During Contract Execution [Out of Gas]”?
questions.answer:
Reason:
 There was not enough gas for the transaction.

 This scanner error means the gas limit you set was above the minimum but still not sufficient to get the transaction to execute. Please try again with a higher gas limit. Also, we recommend not to change the gas limit manually, your wallet will set the needed amount automatically.

questions.title: Why do I have a long-lasting “Pending” status of a Multi-Chain transaction?
questions.answer: Presumably, gas prices increased dramatically during that time. If the above methods did not help, please contact our support team via chat on the website or Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot.

questions.title: Why can't I do the multi-chain swap?
questions.answer:
Unfortunately, we don’t support tokens with an included fee to sell via multi-chain routing. We are working on implementing this feature.
 For now we suggest you to sell these types of tokens for stable or native coins via on-chain swap and then do the multi-chain swap with the token you have bought.

questions.title: Why do I get Method Execution Error: Error: Internal JSON-RPC error.
Rubic Autorefund Policy.
questions.answer: Rubic’s team will complete the refund in USDC tokens. The amount of the refund will be equal to the amount of tokens in USD at the moment when the trade was initiated. the refund will be completed in the target network. You can find the detailed information about the Rubic's auto-refund system by using this link.

1.label: CRYPTOLOVE
1.description: Recevez votre gaz en cashback pour avoir terminé le premier échange multi-chaînes sur notre plateforme !

2.label: Remboursement du gaz d'Avalanche
2.description:
Pour célébrer le lancement du routage optimisé Rubic multi-chaînes
 sur le réseau Avalanche, nous lançons une nouvelle campagne de remboursement de gaz ! Du 19 octobre au 2 novembre, nos utilisateurs pourront effectuer un échange en utilisant leurs jetons préférés sur le réseau Avalanche en utilisant le routage optimisé Rubic multi-chaînes et se faire rembourser leur gaz.

warningModal.highSlippage: Slippage happens when traders buy or sell their assets for more or less than the expected price. During the transaction, the token price might change, so the trade has a chance to be less efficient or be front-runned by bots.
warningModal.highPriceImpact: Price impact refers to how underlying tokens will affect your trade/transaction based on the market price. In simple terms, this warning means that you might lose a substantial part of your crypto if you continue with your transaction.

airdrop.title: Rubic Token Claim
airdrop.description: Using this website, you can check if any of your addresses are eligible to withdraw RUBIC Tokens (RBC).
airdrop.goodAddress: Yes, this address is eligible for a token claim
airdrop.badAddress: Sorry, this address is not eligible to claim any tokens
airdrop.tokenDescription: In case of a successful claim, new RBC tokens will be allocated to your wallet

notification.paused: The token claim is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later
notification.claimed: Tokens are claimed already, please check your wallet
notification.unknown: Oops, something went wrong, please try again later
notification.reject: You rejected the execution of the transaction. Please confirm it first in order to complete the claim
notification.modalDescription: The address in your wallet and the address to claim tokens are different. Do you agree to claim tokens at a different address?
notification.unauthorized: You have to be logged in to add the Token

modals.success: Your tokens are on the way!
